SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractAddableView
This class are kind of a base thing for views that show an action column with button in a TableView.
AbstractCrudService<R,T,ID>
Generic abstract service that delegate CRUD operations to a repository (composition style).
AbstractView
Abstract base view that centralizes a reusable alert helper and small UI utilities.
ActionButtonTableCell<R>
A table cell that show a reusable action button (Delete / Toggle / etc).
AlertHelper
A tiny helper for JavaFX alerts.
BaseEntity
Abstract JPA base class that hold a Long id and try to be proxy-safe for equals/hashCode (it use Hibernate.getClass(Object) for checks).
CategoriesView
View/controller for manage categories screen.
Category
Very simple category entity with a normalized unique name.
CategoryCreate
Tiny DTO for create or rename a category.
CategoryRepository
Repository for Category entities built on top of HibernateRepository.
CategoryRow
UI friendly row for categories.
CategoryServiceImpl
Final service implementation for work with Category entities.
CrudRepository<T,ID>
Very small generic persistence port.
Deadline
Deadline / bill entity that represent a single due item in the ledger.
DeadlineCreate
A compact DTO used to create a deadline (like a bill or some charge to pay).
DeadlineRow
UI friendly row for the deadlines table.
DeadlineServiceImpl
Deadline service: CRUD ops plus a atomic toggle and a small view projection.
DeadlinesView
View/controller for Deadlines screen.
FilterMode
Filter modes for compare a date against “today”.
FormHelper
Small helper that can be instanced for read / validate form fields.
HibernateRepository<T,ID>
Generic repository backed by Hibernate that implements CrudRepository.
HibernateUtil
Utility that bootstraps Hibernate and give a single SessionFactory for the whole app.
IAddableView
Generic interface for controller that can add things.
IAlertHelper
Tiny abstraction for UI alerts; it help testing and keep code not too coupled.
ICategoryService
Service contract for work with Category entities.
ICrudService<T,ID>
Minimal CRUD service, like really tiny.
IDeadlineService
Service contract for deadlines.
Identifiable<ID>
Object that expose a technical identifier.
ITransactionService
Service contract for working with Transaction aggregates.
IView
Generic interface for controller-view (MVC style).
MainApp
Main JavaFX application entry point.
MovementRow
UI friendly row for the movements / transactions table (no tags version).
Named
Objects that expose a human readable name.
ServiceFactory
Very tiny service locator for this app.
StatisticsView
Screen for show statistics about transactions per category.
Transaction
Financial transaction entity that represent an income or an expense.
TransactionCreate
Tiny DTO to create a transaction (no tags version).
TransactionRepository
Hibernate Criteria API based repository for Transaction.
TransactionServiceImpl
Transaction service (no Tag handling here).
TransactionsView
View/controller for manage transactions list.
TransactionType
Kind of financial transaction — basically the direction where money go.
TxFilter
Tiny value object that group optional query criterias for transactions.
